title: Genesis Chapter 33 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 33 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: Who said "I have enough, my brother; keep that thou hast unto thyself" in Genesis 33:9?
questions.explanation: Genesis 33:9 states: "And Esau said, I have enough, my brother; keep that thou hast unto thyself."

questions.question: Who said "Nay, I pray thee, if now I have found grace in thy sight, then receive my pre..." in Genesis 33:10?
questions.explanation: Genesis 33:10 states: "And Jacob said, Nay, I pray thee, if now I have found grace in thy sight, then receive my present at my hand: for the..."

questions.question: Who said "Let me now leave with thee some of the folk that are with me" in Genesis 33:15?
questions.explanation: Genesis 33:15 states: "And Esau said, Let me now leave with thee some of the folk that are with me. And he said, What needeth it? let me fin..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 33:18, who came to Shalem?
questions.explanation: Genesis 33:18 states: "And Jacob came to Shalem, a city of Shechem, which is in the land of Canaan, when he came from Padanaram; and pitched..."

questions.question: Where was Jacob according to Genesis 33:18?
questions.explanation: Genesis 33:18 states: "And Jacob came to Shalem, a city of Shechem, which is in the land of Canaan, when he came from Padanaram; and pitched..."

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Genesis 33:19?
questions.explanation: Genesis 33:19 states: "And he bought a parcel of a field, where he had spread his tent, at the hand of the children of Hamor, Shechem's fath..."

questions.question: In Genesis 33:1, Rachel came forth.
questions.explanation: This is false. It was Esau, not Rachel, who came forth. Genesis 33:1 states: "And Jacob lifted up his eyes, and looked, and, behold, Esau came, and with him four hundred men. ..."

questions.question: In Genesis 33:17, Jacob called Succoth.
questions.explanation: This is correct. Genesis 33:17 states: "And Jacob journeyed to Succoth, and built him an house, and made booths for his cattle: therefore..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 33:2: "And he put the handmaids and their children foremost, and Leah and her children after, and ______ and Joseph hindermost."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And he put the handmaids and their children foremost, and Leah and her children after, and Rachel and Joseph hindermost."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 33:3: "And he ______ over before them, and bowed himself to the ground seven times, until he came near to his brother."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And he passed over before them, and bowed himself to the ground seven times, until he came near to his brother."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 33:4: "And ______ ran to meet him, and embraced him, and fell on his neck, and kissed him: and they wept."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Esau ran to meet him, and embraced him, and fell on his neck, and kissed him: and they wept."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 33:5: "And he ______ up his eyes, and saw the women and the children; and said, Who are those with thee? And he said, The children which God hath gracious..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And he lifted up his eyes, and saw the women and the children; and said, Who are those with thee? And he said, The ch..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 33:6: "Then the ______ came near, they and their children, and they bowed themselves."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Then the handmaidens came near, they and their children, and they bowed themselves."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 33:7: "And Leah also with her children came near, and bowed themselves: and after came Joseph near and ______, and they bowed themselves."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Leah also with her children came near, and bowed themselves: and after came Joseph near and Rachel, and they bowe..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 33:8: "And he said, What ______ thou by all this drove which I met? And he said, These are to find grace in the sight of my lord."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And he said, What meanest thou by all this drove which I met? And he said, These are to find grace in the sight of my..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 33:11: "______, I pray thee, my blessing that is brought to thee; because God hath dealt graciously with me, and because I have enough. And he urged him, a..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Take, I pray thee, my blessing that is brought to thee; because God hath dealt graciously with me, and because I have..."
